module.name: Brain Surface Extractor
module.description: Brain Surface Extractor: Removes non-brain tissue from the MRI using a combinations of anisotropic diffusion filtering, MArr-Hildreth edge detection, and mathematical morphology

citations.citation: Shattuck DW, Sandor-Leahy SR, Schaper KA, Rottenberg DA, and Leahy RM, (2001) "Magnetic Resonance Image Tissue Classification Using a Partial Volume Model", Neuroimage 13(5):856-876 PMID: 11304082

input.name: Input File
input.description: Whole Brain Volume

input.name: Edge Sigma
input.description: edge detection constant [default: 0.62]. Typical range is [0.5,1.0].

input.name: Diffusion Constant
input.description: Typical range is [5.0,40.0] for byte images

input.name: Iterations
input.description: Number of iterations for diffusion filter.

input.name: Verbosity
input.description: 0=silent, 1=limited, 2=all warnings.

input.name: Trim Brainstem
input.description: Trim brainstem

input.name: Size
input.description: radius of erosion/dilation filter [default: 1]

input.name: Dilate Final Mask
input.description: Dilate final mask

input.name: Show Timing
input.description: Show Timing

input.name: Remove Neck
input.description: remove neck (assumes LPI orientation)

input.name: Retain Orientation
input.description: Retain original orientation (default behavior will auto-rotate input NII files to LPI orientation)

module.name: Analyze Image to MNC
module.description: This program converts Analyze Image to Minc file format.

input.name: Model Minc File
input.description: Model volume for the Analyze file being converted (i.e. create file using world coordinates from this file).

input.name: Overwrite
input.description: Clobber (overwrite) existing output if it already exists.

input.name: Input Analyze Image File
input.description: Specifies the input Analyze Volume file path to be converted.

output.name: Output Minc
output.description: Specifies the output MNC file path.

input.name: Verbose
input.description: Instructs the program to be verbose.

input.name: No Verbose
input.description: Opposite of -verbose. (Default)

module.license:

module.name: MINC Resample
module.description: Resamples a MINC file along new spatial dimensions using a given transform

input.name: Transformation (use_input_sampling)
input.description: File giving world transformation using the input sampling without transforming. (Default = identity)

input.name: Transformation (tfm_input_sampling)
input.description: File giving world transformation with transforming the input sampling with the transform. (Default = identity)

input.name: Transformation (like)
input.description: File giving world transformation along with a model file for the resampling. (Default = identity)

input.name: Invert transformation
input.description: Invert the transformation before using it

input.name: No-Invert Transformation
input.description: Do not invert the transformation. This is the default setting.

input.name: Use Input Sampling
input.description: Use the input sampling without transforming (old behaviour).

input.name: Like
input.description: Specifies a model file for the resampling.

input.name: Spacetype
input.description: Set the spacetype attribute to a specified string.

input.name: Overwrite (clobber)
input.description: Overwrite existing file.

input.name: Don't Overwrite (no clobber)
input.description: Do not overwrite existing file. This is the default setting.

input.name: Verbose
input.description: Print out log messages as processing is being done. This is the default setting.

input.name: Quiet
input.description: Do not print out any log messages.

input.name: Talairach
input.description: Output is in Talairach space.

input.name: Units
input.description: Specify the units of the output sampling.

input.name: X-Elements
input.description: Number of elements along the X dimension. (Default: 0)

input.name: Y-Elements
input.description: Number of elements along the Y dimension. (Default: 0)

input.name: Z-Elements
input.description: Number of elements along the Z dimension. (Default: 0)

input.name: TFM Input Sampling
input.description: Transform the input sampling with the transform. This is the default setting.

input.name: Do Not Keep Real Range
input.description: Do not keep the real scale of the data. This is the default setting.

input.name: X-Step
input.description: Step size along the X dimension. (Default: 0)

input.name: Y-Step
input.description: Step size along the Y dimension. (Default: 0)

input.name: Z-Step
input.description: Step size along the Z dimension. (Default: 0)

input.name: X-Start
input.description: Start point along the X dimension. (Default: 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Y-Start
input.description: Start point along the Y dimension. (Default: 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Z-Start
input.description: Start point along the Z dimension. (Default: 1.79769e+308)

input.name: X-DirCos
input.description: Direction cosines along the X dimension. (Default: 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Y-DirCos
input.description: Direction cosines along the Y dimension. (Default: 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Z-DirCos
input.description: Direction cosines along the Z dimension. (Default: 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Transverse
input.description: Write out transverse slices.

input.name: Sagittal
input.description: Write out sagittal slices.

input.name: Coronal
input.description: Write out coronal slices.

input.name: Direction Cosines
input.description: Direction cosines along each dimension (X, Y, Z).

input.name: Nearest Neighbor
input.description: Do nearest neighbour interpolation.

input.name: Byte
input.description: Write out byte data.

input.name: Short
input.description: Write out short integer data.

input.name: Integer
input.description: Write out 32-bit integer data.

input.name: Origin
input.description: Origin of first pixel in 3D space. (Default: 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Long
input.description: Write out long integer data.

input.name: Float
input.description: Write out single-precision floating-point data.

input.name: Double
input.description: Write out double-precision floating-point data.

input.name: Keep Real Range
input.description: Keep the real scale of the input volume.

input.name: Signed
input.description: Write signed integer data.

input.name: Trilinear
input.description: Do trilinear interpolation.

input.name: Unsigned
input.description: Write unsigned integer data.

input.name: Tricubic
input.description: Do tricubic interpolation.

input.name: Range
input.description: Valid range for output data (Default: -1.79769e+308 -1.79769e+308)

input.name: Fill Value
input.description: Specify a fill value for points outside of input volume. (Default: 1.79769e+308)

input.name: Fill
input.description: Use a fill value for points outside of input volume.

input.name: No Fill
input.description: Use value zero for points outside of input volume

input.name: Input
input.description: Specify the input file path.

input.name: Standard Sampling
input.description: Set the sampling to standard values (step, start and dircos).

input.name: Step
input.description: Step size along each dimension (X, Y, Z). (Default: 0 0 0)

input.name: No Keep Real Range
input.description: Do not keep the real scale of the data. This is the default setting.

input.name: Number of Elements
input.description: Number of elements along each dimension (X, Y, Z) .

input.name: Start
input.description: Start point along each dimension (X, Y, Z).

viewerModule.name: LONI Viewer
viewerModule.description:
This is a general, versatile and light-weight viewer, which allows visualzaition of:
1. Volumetric data parseable by the LONI Debabeler (http://www.loni.ucla.edu/Software/Debabeler)
2. Shape/Surface objects in any of the ShapeTools geometry shape formats (http://www.loni.ucla.edu/Software/ShapeTools).

filetype.name: MESH obj
filetype.description: A type of MESH obj file.

module.name: smartline_Kids Orig MNC Data_Brain Surface Extractor
module.description: Smartline conversion from type (mnc) of module Kids Orig MNC Data to type (img,hdr) of module Brain Surface Extractor of package BrainSuite11a
